short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension to scrape order details from Amazon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝗔𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗼𝗻 𝗢𝗿𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗦𝗰𝗿𝗮𝗽𝗲𝗿 – 𝗘𝘅𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗣𝘂𝗿𝗰𝗵𝗮𝘀𝗲 𝗛𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗼𝗿𝘆 𝘄𝗶𝘁𝗵 𝗘𝗮𝘀𝗲!
The Amazon Order Scraper is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help Amazon buyers easily export their purchase history. With just a few clicks, you can extract detailed information about your orders and save it as a CSV or Excel file.

𝗞𝗲𝘆 𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀:
Export order history directly from your Amazon buyer account.
Get valuable details, including:
1) Order Placed Date
2) Order Link
3) Price
4) Tracking ID
5) Order Status

𝗕𝗲𝗻𝗲𝗳𝗶𝘁𝘀 𝗼𝗳 𝗨𝘀𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗔𝗺𝗮𝘇𝗼𝗻 𝗢𝗿𝗱𝗲𝗿 𝗦𝗰𝗿𝗮𝗽𝗲𝗿:
𝗦𝗮𝘃𝗲 𝗧𝗶𝗺𝗲:No more manual data entry—quickly export all your order details in seconds.
𝗦𝘁𝗮𝘆 𝗢𝗿𝗴𝗮𝗻𝗶𝘇𝗲𝗱: Keep track of all your purchases in one place for better financial planning.
𝗧𝗿𝗮𝗰𝗸 𝗗𝗲𝗹𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗿𝗶𝗲𝘀: Easily monitor the tracking status of your orders and follow up as needed.
𝗖𝗿𝗲𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝗥𝗲𝗽𝗼𝗿𝘁𝘀: Generate detailed purchase summaries for analysis or bookkeeping.
